title: Summer Street Food Festival
description: Join us for a day full of delicious bites from over 40 food trucks and street vendors, live music, and family-friendly activities. Whether you're a foodie or just looking for a fun summer outing, this event is for you!

title: Startup Networking Night
description: An evening for entrepreneurs, developers, and investors to meet and exchange ideas over drinks. Bring your business cards!

title: Spring Jazz Festival
address: Parc de la Villette, 211 Avenue Jean Jaurès, 75019 Paris
description: A weekend-long celebration of jazz music featuring local and international artists. Food trucks and vinyl market on site.
